verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> in the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne<s%> a <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G2081>inside<s%> and on the <S%G3693>back,<s%> <S%G2696>sealed<s%> up with <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> and to <S%G3089>break<s%> its <S%G4973>seals<s%>?"

And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G3777>or<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> into it.

And I [began] to <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G4183>greatly,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G3777>or<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> into it;

and <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G3361>"Stop<s%> <S%G2799>weeping;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3023>Lion<s%> that is from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> the <S%G4491>Root<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> has <S%G3528>overcome<s%> so as to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> and its <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G1722>between<s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> (with the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%>) and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> a <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G2476>standing,<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> <S%G4969>slain,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> out into <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
And He <S%G2064>came,<s%> and He <S%G2983>took<s%> [it] out of the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of Him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> He had <S%G2983>taken<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> and the twenty-four <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> a <S%G2788>harp,<s%> and <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G2368>incense,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And they <S%G103>sang<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G514>"Worthy<s%> <S%G1510>art<s%> Thou to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and to <S%G455>break<s%> its <S%G4973>seals;<s%> for Thou wast <S%G4969>slain,<s%> and didst <S%G59>purchase<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> with Thy <S%G129>blood<s%> [men] from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> and <S%G1100>tongue<s%> and <S%G2992>people<s%> and <S%G1484>nation.<s%>
"And Thou hast <S%G4160>made<s%> them [to be] a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> and <S%G2409>priests<s%> to our <S%G2316>God;<s%> and they will <S%G936>reign<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"

And I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2945>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and the <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders;<s%> and the <S%G706>number<s%> of them was <S%G3461>myriads<s%> of <S%G3461>myriads,<s%> and <S%G5505>thousands<s%> of <S%G5505>thousands,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G514>"Worthy<s%> is the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> that was <S%G4969>slain<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G4149>riches<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G2479>might<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G2129>blessing.<s%>"

And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>created<s%> <S%G2938>thing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in them, I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "To Him who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> [be] <S%G2129>blessing<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>"

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> kept <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>"Amen.<s%>" And the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped.<s%>
